features: 👍【EASY INSTALLATION】 The screen protector is specially designed for iPhone 11/XR 6.1 inch screen, 100% touch accurate. It's a two-pack and comes with an auto-alignment installation frame for effortless adhesion. Super easy to install!

💪【USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN】 The open edge design does not in any way disrupt images of the front camera and as a result does NOT interfere with Face ID. The iPhone 11/iPhone XR tempered glass is designed to be a little smaller than the actual screen, providing just the right fit and compatibility for your phone cases.

💎【Double Defence Shatterproof Protection】UNBREAKcable iPhone 11 Screen Protector/iPhone XR Screen Protector is made from superior 9H tempered glass and is highly durable and scratch-resistant, reinforced ​to be twice as strong as other ordinary tempered films on the market, your screen would survive a drop from a height of 6 feet (1.8 meters) to a hard surface, while its edges will not break easily.

💧【Bubble-free& Anti-fingerprint】The iPhone 11/XR tempered glass screen protector will self-expel air bubbles when automatically bonding with the screen. Coated with hydrophobic and oleophobic clear layers on the glass protector can against oil residue from fingerprints from long-term use.

🍀【99.99% HD CLEAR】 Ultra-thin and ultra-clear material makes it retain amazing clarity for the viewing experience. High-quality design and engineering, durable tempered glass to deliver the brightness, sharpness, and detail you expect from your phone screen. The visual experience is comparable to the device itself because of the crystal-clear protective layer.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: If you meet any problems below when you are using UNBREAKcable iPhone 11 / XR Screen Protector, UNBREAKcable will send you a New One: Broken/CrackAir bubblesDoesn't fit your phoneMissing Accessories

UNBREAKcable iPhone 11 / iPhone XR Screen Protector [2-Pack], 9H Hardness Tempered Glass Screen Protector for Apple iPhone 11 / iPhone XR-6.1'' Warm Reminder: Please confirm your phone model before you purchase. What are the features? Super Easy Installation, 9H Hardness, Shatterproof, Automatically Bonding, Bubble-Free, Shockproof, Anti-Scratches, Anti-Fingerprints, HD(99.99% transparency), 3D Touch Support, Case-Friendly, etc. These features make the UNBREAKcable screen protector the best shield for your iPhone 11 / XR screen. What can we do? UNBREAKcable provides super protection for your screen and exclusive professional service. Our Auto Alignment Kit makes installation easier than ever, you can successfully install this screen protector in 10 seconds, even with no previous experience. Q1. How drop-resistant are our UNBREAKcable 11 / XR screen protector? Every single piece of the UNBREAKcable iPhone 11/XR screen protector has passed a 9H pencil test and a 10.4 kg / 23 lbs pressure test. As a result, this tempered glass screen protector keeps your display intact and flawless daily, preventing any scratches, scrapes, or cracks. Q2. What is the specialty of this screen protector compared with much cheaper ones? Our screen protector made with superior 9H tempered glass is highly durable and scratch-resistant, reinforced ​to be twice as strong as other ordinary tempered films on the market. 10s Super-easy Installed Auto Alignment Kit makes your installation easier than ever. This screen protector utilizes automatic adsorption technology to ensure that no bubbles can exist during the installation process.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Actually easy to install even for a novice.
reviews.reviewText: Over time, the protective glass screen protector on my iPhone 11 had become cracked and chipped on some of the edges. I delayed replacing it as I thought the action of accomplishing the replacement would be difficult. The very clear instructions were easy to follow and the entire process was totally "painless" and easily performed by an 81 year old who is not terribly proficient at such things. The new screen protector works as advertised with no difference noted in performance with the original.😉

reviews.reviewText: I was only expecting to get a body protector but it also came with a screen protector and both fit perfectly for my iPhone 11. Looks like a brand new phone again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Strong, Easily installed Screen Protector
reviews.reviewText: This screen protector is very clear. It is rigid, so if the iPhone is dropped the screen protector may crack. That’s much better than the iPhone screen cracking. I speak from experience as I had to replace my first two screen protectors (2 screen protectors come in a package).Be very careful in preparing the iPhone screen for installing the screen protector. Use the supplied wet wipe and lint free cloth to clean the iPhone screen. Then use the dust absorbed “sticky” wipe to clean the dust specs from the screen, followed by the dust pick up strip. The install kit has a plastic frame that supposedly aids in aligning the screen. That frame is too large for an iPhone 11 Pro. Thus, for me it is useless.Also, the screen is just a little too long. Without a case, I didn’t notice this. I achieved a 100% adhesion of the screen protector to the screen. I use a flexible clear case marketed by Torres (Amazon purchase also). When I squeeze my iPhone into that case the slight overhang of the protector is “lifted” a little. I can see the air gap at the top of the screen. The gap is not on the illuminated part of the screen. I only see the lift when the iPhone is turned off. I can live with that.

I just installed this screen protector on my phone but I’m already loving it, and their warranty which says they’ll replace if defective is great. I’ve previously used the JETech screen protectors (iPhone 11) and they ALWAYS crack extremely easily so I’ve decided to try something new. My screen already seems much more receptive to touch with this new screen protector compared to the JETech one. Super easy application too, no bubbles or lifting around the edges, and took about 45 seconds!
Einfache Handhabung und passt wie angegossen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The easiest glass screen protector I’ve ever put on.The plastic guide edge to put on first makes it so so easy. And it lined up perfectly. Pk of 2 as well. Very impressed.Will definitely buy them again.
Perfecto protector de pantalla para el iPhone 11. Muy resistente. Fácil de instalar.

La protection est fine et solide et vient avec tout ce qu’il faut pour l’installer. J’en ai eu pour a peine 5 minutes. Il n’y a aucune gêne sur l’écran et avoir une protection de rechange au cas où est très rassurant.
